ygData.subject: Where to get Gladiator
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey - I bought Gladiator years and years ago, spent WAY too much time playing it, aquired many fond memories, and now I cannot find the disk. . . Where can I

Hey - I bought Gladiator years and years ago, spent WAY too much time 
playing it, aquired many fond memories, and now I cannot find the 
disk. . . Where can I find it?  FSgames.com seems to be defunct.
